name: Soap & Soul
description:
Soap & Soul

Created by Nicole Quintero

Sophie the ghost has run out of soap. With good hygiene of paramount importance she embarks on an epic adventure that will introduce Carlos the Capybara, Fisk the Fox, Skyler the Skunk, and hopefully a final destiny with a new bar of soap.

A short but memorable 2D top-down adventure that will leave you smiling.
